title: Fugitives MC
description: From the author of the Los Perdidos MC series comes a wild and steamy full-length novella that’s sure to rev your engines!Tallie Hendricks lost her older brother, Kyle, to the Fugitives MC as a young girl. Now all grown up, she returns to her home town of Crystal Spring to exact revenge on the club. What she doesn’t bargain for is Spider -- the newly-elected vice-president of the club and Kyle’s best friend. When Tallie and Spider come together, the sparks are immediate, and Tallie finds herself torn between exacting vengeance for her shattered past, and an uncertain future in the arms of a biker bad boy.
author: Daphne Loveling
